Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Technological \Tech`no*log"ic*al\, a. [Cf. F. technologique.] Of or pertaining to technology. [1913 Webster]

technological adj 1: based in scientific and industrial progress; "a technological civilization" 2: of or relating to a practical subject that is organized according to scientific principles; "technical college"; "technological development" [syn: {technical}]
